de.szut.dqi12.cheftrainer.connectorlib.utils

Class JSONUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.szut.dqi12.cheftrainer.connectorlib.utils.JSONUtils

  • public class JSONUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides a few JSON method, which could be used to transform JSONObject etc. to something else. Or other way round.
    Author:
    Alexander Brennecke

    • Method Detail

      • mapToJSON

        public static org.json.JSONObject mapToJSON(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Boolean> map)
        This class created a JSONObject out of the given HashMap.
        Parameters:
        map - the Map, that should be transformed to a JSON.
        Returns:
        a new JSONObject with the map information inside.

      • listToJSON

        public static org.json.JSONArray listToJSON(java.util.List<? extends Sendable> valueList)
        This function is used to create a JSONArray based on a List of objects, which extends the Sendable abstract class.
        Parameters:
        valueList - a list of classes, which extends from the Sendable abstract class.
        Returns:
        a JSONArray based on the given List
